Chapter.Title: Python Question 3
Chapter.Data: Change the program shown in the editor so that Merscythe can escape from Ari’s lab. You should only change the if/else statement in the program so that if the name Ari is entered as input on the screen, the program should print “Access denied”. Otherwise, if any other name is entered, the program should print out the two words “Access granted” and the exit must be unlocked. If your program runs correctly, chapter 4 will be unlocked.

Instruction.ExpectedOutput:
Input Output
Ari Hello, Ari

Access denied
Any other name Hello, user input
